unittitle_ssm: Oliver Starr St. John lecture notes on the Battle of Long Island
abstract_ssm: One bound volume containing handwritten notes on a lecture given by Oliver Starr St. John on the Battle of Long Island at the Long Island Historical Society (now the Brooklyn Historical Society) in 1864.
